name: The Extremely Useful Company
goal: The Extremely Useful Company offers a range of consultancy services in the domains of R&D, innovation, space, environment, climate and high-tech. Services include strategy & policy development; project, proposal and programme management; market & industry survey; access to EU funding.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Research,development and innovation policy and programmes; space policy and programmes; competitiveness and entrepreneurship policy and programmes.
